SELECT
FROM USERS U JOIN ORDERS O1 ON U.ID = O1.ID JOIN ORDER_DETAIL O2 ON O1.ORDER_CODE = O2.ORDER_CODE JOIN ORDER_STATUS O3 ON O3.DETAIL_CODE = O2.DETAIL_CODE JOIN PRODUCT P ON O2.P_CODE = P.P_CODE WHERE U.ID = #{ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDER_STATUS SET OD_STATUS =#{od_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE detail_code=#{detail_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_STATUS ( DETAIL_CODE, OD_STATUS, REG_DT, UDT_DT ) VALUES ( #{detail_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{od_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{udt_dt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
